description:
Usopp regains consciousness after his vicious beating, but he`s not at all happy to hear Luffy`s plans for the Going Merry. Temper flares and challenges are issued as the Straw Hats face their most uncertain hour.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Fight Under the Moon! The Pirate Flag Flutters with Sorrow!
Gekka no Oogenka! Kanashimi ni Hirugaeru Kaizokuki!
Mutinerie au clair de lune ! Complainte d’un drapeau pirate !
Драка под луной! Слёзы пиратского корабля!
แตกคอใต้แสงจันทร์! ธงโจรสลัดที่โบกสะบัดต่อความเศร้า!
月下の大喧嘩! 哀しみに翻る海賊旗!
